name: Tchu-Tchu, stuck in a Loop
description:
Little project made in Game Jam for the 47th edition of the Ludum Dare.

You play Wobble, a creature riding in a minecart. He's trying to find the exit of the mineshaft. But he's somehow gotten stuck in it! Looping the same way again and again..

Necro Carmilla :  Programmer / Game Art

Dr.Vagrov : Game Art / Game Design

R.A.F : Lead Game Art
